item.description:
@watch_n_lern wrote:

to make an npc attack you go to npchandler.java and search annoyed

and it should say like all the cases that get annoyed

such at 2745 which is jad, just add the case u want.

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: @luster_xg luster xg
item.description:
@luster_xg wrote:

I am using a 508 bulby source.

1st For example you attack a npc and then you walk away and then npc does not follow you. How do i make the npc follow you?

2nd. How I add an object? I tried client.java but i could not find case 121 or the newobject()

3rd. Also how do i add a shops and shop items?

4th. when i added a tele command } else if(cmd[0].equals("Staffmet") && p.jailed != 1) { p.teleportTo(3267, 2783, 0, 4, 0, 8939, 8941, 1678, 0, 1679, 0); p.frames.sendMessage(p, "<img=1><col=fff000><shad=0202>You teleport to the secret staff area!<img=1>"); and i compiled the server again but when i tested it on the server it wont work.

5th. How do i add models in my game that are already in the client models folder .

Read full topic
